catalog_info.title: Advanced Topics in Computer Architecture
catalog_info.prereq: Recommended: Computer Science 146 or 246 or permission of the instructor.
catalog_info.description: Seminar course exploring recent research in computer architecture. Topics vary from year to year and will include subjects such as multi-core architectures, energy-efficient computing, reliable computing, and the interactions of these issues with system software. Students read and present research papers, undertake a research project.
